titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the special rule for contributions of book inventory to public schools.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the special rule for contributions of book inventory to public schools.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2011 the enhanced tax deduction for charitable contributions of book inventory to public schools.
